argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ipcau.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ipcau.h | |- ., = ( .i ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ipcau.n | |- N = ( norm ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( toCHil ` W ) = ( toCHil ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> W e. CPreHil ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cphphl | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. PreHil ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> W e. PreHil ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_cphsca | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 9 | #P_cphsqrtcl | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) /\ x e. RR /\ 0 <_ x ) ) -> ( sqrt ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) /\ x e. RR /\ 0 <_ x ) ) -> ( sqrt ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2 | #P_ipge0 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ x e. V ) -> 0 <_ ( x ., x ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) /\ x e. V ) -> 0 <_ ( x ., x ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) = ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( Y ., X ) / ( Y ., Y ) ) = ( ( Y ., X ) / ( Y ., Y ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> X e. V ) |
| 19 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> Y e. V ) |
| 20 | 4, 1, 5, 8, 11, 2, 13, 15, 9, 16, 17, 18, 19 | #P_ipcau2 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( abs ` ( X ., Y ) ) <_ ( ( ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ` X ) x. ( ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 21 | 4, 3 | #P_cphtchnm | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> N = ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ) |
| 22 | 6, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> N = ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` X ) = ( ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ` X ) ) |
| 24 | 22 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` Y ) = ( ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ` Y ) ) |
| 25 | 23, 24 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( N ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) = ( ( ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ` X ) x. ( ( norm ` ( toCHil ` W ) ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 26 | 20, 25 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( abs ` ( X ., Y ) ) <_ ( ( N ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) |
